title: The Sorcerer's Misery
description: Book 2: The Sorcererâ€™s MiseryThe Sorcerer Sento sits at his fortress all day thinking about Galen. He has never-ending dreams of the teenager. It becomes depressing to him after months of loneliness.Galen is the binded lover of Prince Darne, but Sento thinks otherwise. He will not be held back from seeing the young man. With all the spare time he spends alone, he formulates a plan to go after Galen.If his plans fail he will have a very angry Prince to deal with. Sento does not care, for he himself is feared by all in the lands. Will all be fine with Galen, or are there other creatures lurking in the darkness wishing to have him?Fast-paced and action-packed...
author: Joan   Smith
